entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 30 km/h early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
